modName: Arrow to the knee dialogue remover
summary: Removes the Arrow to the knee dialogue from guards.
descriptionHtml:
Removes the Arrow to the knee dialogue from guards.

If you do encounter the phrase from other guards, in whiterun or otherwise, just comment and tell me what guard and in what city and I\'ll see if it can be fixed.

Can be downloaded from the steam workshop at:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7442


Due to being unable to delete the entry in the dialogue section of the guards entry in the creation kit I had to edit the guard to just not have any dialogue at all for that entry and turn it into an *EMPTY entry.
I checked on the entries for the other guards (of various cities) and it had changed the \"arrow to the knee\" entry to \"*EMPTY\" as well, so I\'m just assuming it\'s removed it for everyone and not just the whiterun guards template.
author: Lockyy
